entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The person Voldemort is planning to kill. He is referred to as 'Potter'.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A follower of Voldemort who is scolded for not keeping the prisoner quiet.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main character and leader of the followers. He is planning to kill Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Voldemort scolds Wormtail for not keeping the prisoner quiet.
Voldemort is planning to kill Harry Potter.
